content.name: replicationInterface
content.description: Information about replication interfaces in the storage system. These interfaces  are used in remote replication connections and sessions for replication data transfer.

attributes.name: ipProtocolVersion
attributes.description: IP protocol version of the replication interface.

attributes.name: ipPort
attributes.description: Physical port or link aggregation on the storage processor on which the  replication interface is running, as defined by the ipPort resource type.

attributes.name: vlanId
attributes.description:
Virtual Local Area Network (VLAN) identifier for the replication interface. The interface uses the identifier to accept packets that have matching VLAN tags.

Values are 0 - 4094. The default is 0, which means that the packets to accept do not have VLAN tags.

attributes.name: macAddress
attributes.description: MAC address of the virtual Ethernet port used for the replication interface. A  physical Ethernet port has a different MAC address.

attributes.name: netmask
attributes.description: IPv4 netmask for the replication interface, if it uses an IPv4 address.

attributes.name: ipAddress
attributes.description: IP address of the replication interface.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health of the replication interface, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: gateway
attributes.description: IPv4 or IPv6 gateway address for the replication interface.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the replicationInterface instance.

attributes.name: v6PrefixLength
attributes.description: IPv6 prefix length for the replication interface, if it uses an IPv6 address.
